patākā lakṣaṇam stūpāt na grāhyam yatinā akhalu
prāṃśu kūlam iti grāhyam anila uddhūta pātitam

original: śulkakṛtyaṃ paradravyaṃ na nayet nāpi nāyayeta /
analyzed: śulka kṛtyam para dravyam na nayet na api nāyayeta
śulka pradāna mokṣa artha upāyam na upadiśet yatiḥ

original: ratnaṃ datvā yatibhyaḥ prāk paścāt mārgayate vaṇik /
analyzed: ratnam da tvā yatibhyaḥ prāk paścāt mārgayate vaṇij
visaṃvādayasi iti evam dātavyam paribhāṣya tat
na asti śulkam muneḥ evam vratinām pāribhogike

varṣāvāsika lābhaḥ hi deyaḥ varṣa uṣitasya ca
jīvita brahmacaryasya yayoḥ nāśaḥ tayoḥ api

original: paścādupagataiḥ paścāt saṃghe yugapadeva ca // Śghs_3,2.41 //

punar gṛhṇāti dīkṣām yaḥ vastu karma jugupsayā

original: bhikṣubhāvaṃ parityajya tasmai cāpyāha sarvavit // Śghs_3,2.42 //
analyzed: bhikṣu bhāvam parityajya tasmai ca api āha sarva vid
avarṣa uṣita vibhrānta kudṛṣṭi mṛtakāḥ tathā

analyzed: dātavyaḥ niyatam tasmai sa vikalpita bhikṣave

original: traye kurvanti cānarthaṃ tebhyo deyaṃbudharna hi // Śghs_3,2.45 //
analyzed: traye kurvanti ca anartham tebhyaḥ deyam budhaḥ na hi
ācchādam cīvaram mūlyam dāsyāmi iti catuṣpadaiḥ

original: āpnoti sammukhībhūtān lābho netareṣu ca // Śghs_3,2.46 //
analyzed: āpnoti sammukhībhūtān lābhaḥ na itareṣu ca
varṣāvāsika lābhaḥ ca varṣa uṣitasya gacchati

original: tadetarasya doṣo na gṛhṇato dāyakecchayā // Śghs_3,2.47 //
analyzed: tadā itarasya doṣaḥ na gṛhṇataḥ dāyaka icchayā
kālikaḥ yāmikaḥ yāvajjīvikaḥ sāptāhikaḥ
mṛta kṣudra pariṣkāra naityaka ākāla cīvaram
prāpnoti daśadhā lābhaḥ sammukhībhūta pudgalān
anādheyam guru dravyam sāṃghikam śayana āsanam

original: vikretavyaṃ na bhoktavyaṃ kṛtvā paudgalikaṃ na ca // Śghs_3,2.50 //
analyzed: vikretavyam na bhoktavyam kṛtvā paudgalikam na ca
cāturdiśāya buddhāya sammukhībhūta sāṃghike
yatiḥ dravya antare datte tatra tatra upanāmayet

original: tūṣṇīṃ datvā gate deyaṃ buddhe muktāphalādikaṃ /
analyzed: tūṣṇīm da tvā gate deyam buddhe muktāphala ādikam
cāturdiś sammukhībhūte śayanāsanam aṃśukam
pṛthu dravyam para upāttam tad saṃjñī steya cetanā
sthāna cyutiḥ ca paṃcāṃgaiḥ yuktaḥ ced ayatiḥ bhavet
datta svaka apara upātta saṃjñī ca anyaḥ saṃvarī

original: na tāvatkālikaṃ svāṃśād gṛhṇan jahāti saṃvaraṃ // Śghs_3,2.54 //
analyzed: na tāvatkālikam sva aṃśāt gṛhṇan jahāti saṃvaram
ādāya ādattam utplutya kham gatvā āśā catuṣṭayam
tatra eva punar āsīnaḥ bhavati kṣata saṃvaraḥ
avakrīta ādiḥ ajñānāt para dravyam haran khalu
saṃvara kṣobha lābhī sa yatiḥ na unmatta ādikaḥ
saṃvara tyāgaḥ

original: kṣiptvā nigamayet svādaṃ sa [yatiḥ] kṣatasaṃvaraḥ // Śghs_3,3.1 //
analyzed: kṣiptvā nigamayet svādam sa yatiḥ kṣata saṃvaraḥ
mānuṣa amānuṣāḥ te tu tiryañcaḥ ca nara ādayaḥ

original: mṛtāḥ suptāśca jāgranto jñeyā [hi] maithunāśrayāḥ // Śghs_3,3.2 //
analyzed: mṛtāḥ suptāḥ ca jāgrantaḥ jñeyāḥ hi maithuna āśrayāḥ
hastinīm āditas kṛtvā yāvat kukkuṭa jātikām

duṣkṛtāni

bhitti dvaye kṛtām śuṣkām klinnām saṃyojya koṭarīm

original: adha ūrdhvaṃ trikhaṇḍāyā vinīlādhmātikāṃ ca na /
analyzed: adhas ūrdhvam tri khaṇḍāyāḥ vinīla ādhmātikām ca na

original: na cāsthisaṃkalāṃ yāyāt nābhyaktāṃ rudhirādibhiḥ // Śghs_3,3.6 //
analyzed: na ca asthi saṃkalām yāyāt na abhyaktām rudhira ādibhiḥ
sita asthi saṃkalām śailadāru pusta mayīm yatiḥ

original: na ca gacchet striyaṃ yo 'tra virato maithunātsadā // Śghs_3,3.7 //
analyzed: na ca gacchet striyam virataḥ maithunāt sadā
dhyānam iddha gatam mattam abhibhūtam ca nidrayā
vikṣiptam vedanā tunnam gṛhītvā abhiniṣīdati

original: vihārād ghaṭṭanīyaḥ so 'bhāve tu svādanasya na // Śghs_3,3.9 //
analyzed: vihārāt ghaṭṭanīyaḥ saḥ bhāve tu svādanasya na

original: na spṛśet śukramokṣārthaṃ sa pṛthivyādidhātubhiḥ // Śghs_3,3.13 //
analyzed: na spṛśet śukra mokṣa artham sa pṛthivī ādi dhātubhiḥ

original: [sva]mānasaṃ yatigarhet kṛtaṃ me nu virūpakaṃ // Śghs_3,3.14 //
analyzed: sva mānasam yati garhet kṛtam me nu virūpakam

original: saṃraktaḥ [san] yatiḥ strīṇāṃ na nindet na ca saṃstuyāt // Śghs_3,3.17 //

original: yadyad vadet striyaṃ[tāvat] kartukāmo yathā yathā /

analyzed: tat tat tathā tathā brūyāt śrīghanaḥ na antike striyāḥ

original: agrā bhavati sā yoṣid yā māṃ paricared rahaḥ /
analyzed: agrā bhavati sā yoṣit yā mām paricaret rahaḥ
lābhinī ca āyuḥ ādīnām vyādhi hīnā yaśasvinī
ityādi na vacaḥ brūyāt rāga agni pluṣṭa mānasaḥ
purastāt śroghanaḥ strīṇām punapuṃsakayoḥ tathā

original: samāhitaṃ ca me cittaṃ na ca vācyamatīndriyaṃ // Śghs_3,4.4 //

analyzed: śrāmaṇeraḥ hi pratyakṣam śrī ghanāt na kṣipet parān

analyzed: nirmuṣṭa hastam su alpa tve bahu tve tu viparyayāt

analyzed: iti evam sa viruktaḥ syāt kṣeptavyaḥ maṇḍa kuṇḍake
